value.name: Outputfile
value.comment: The outputfile path

value.name: Profile
value.comment: Parameter for profile

class.name: PdfCreatorSettings
class.comment: Container class for PDFCreator settings and profiles

value.name: SettingsVersion
value.comment: Version of the settings classes. This is used for internal purposes, i.e. to match properties when they were renamed

class.name: ApplicationSettings
class.comment: PDFCreator application settings

value.name: Password
value.comment: Password that is used to authenticate at the server

value.name: Server
value.comment: Hostname or IP address of the FTP server

value.name: UserName
value.comment: User name that is used to authenticate at the server

value.name: IsBasicAuthentication
value.comment: If true, basic authenification with user-.name and password is used

value.name: Password
value.comment: Password that is used to authenticate at the server

value.name: Timeout
value.comment: Timeout in seconds for upload

value.name: Url
value.comment: HTTP upload Url

value.name: UserName
value.comment: User-name that is used to authenticate at the server

value.name: Address
value.comment: E-mail address that is displayed as sender

value.name: Password
value.comment: Password that is used to authenticate at the server

value.name: Port
value.comment: SMTP server port

value.name: Server
value.comment: Hostname or IP address of the SMTP server

value.name: Ssl
value.comment: If true, the connection will be encrypted with SSL (must be supported by the server)

value.name: UserName
value.comment: User name that is used to authenticate at the server

value.name: IsSecured
value.comment: Set to true, if the time server needs authentication

value.name: Password
value.comment: Password for the time server

value.name: Url
value.comment: URL of a time server that provides a signed timestamp

value.name: UserName
value.comment: Login name for the time server

value.name: Capacity
value.comment: Max number of jobs tracked in history

value.name: Enabled
value.comment: If enabled PDFCreator tracks latest converted files in history

classarray.name: TitleReplacement
classarray.comment: TitleReplacements are used to automatically replace text in the print job name for the final document's title. i.e. Word prints are named "Document.docx - Microsoft Word", where the replacement can remove the ".docx - Microsoft Word" part.

value.name: LastSaveDirectory
value.comment: The last directory the user during interactive job (if no target directory was set in profile)

class.name: AttachmentPage
class.comment: Appends one or more pages at the end of the converted document

value.name: Enabled
value.comment: Enables the AttachmentPage action

value.name: File
value.comment: Filename of the PDF that will be appended

class.name: AutoSave
class.comment: AutoSave allows to create PDF files without user interaction

value.name: EnsureUniqueFilenames
value.comment: Existing files will not be overwritten. Existing filenames automatically get an appendix.

class.name: BackgroundPage
class.comment: Adds a page background to the resulting document

value.name: Enabled
value.comment: Enables the BackgroundPage action

value.name: File
value.comment: Filename of the PDF that will be used as background

value.name: OnAttachment
value.comment: If true, the background will be placed on the attachment as well

value.name: OnCover
value.comment: If true, the background will be placed on the cover as well

value.name: Repetition
value.comment: Defines the way the background document is repeated.

class.name: CoverPage
class.comment: Inserts one or more pages at the beginning of the converted document

value.name: Enabled
value.comment: Enables the CoverPage action

value.name: File
value.comment: Filename of the PDF that will be inserted

class.name: DropboxSettings
class.comment: Dropbox settings for currently logged user

value.name: AccountId
value.comment: ID of the linked account

value.name: EnsureUniqueFilenames
value.comment: If true, files with the same name will not be overwritten on the server. A counter will be appended instead (i.e. document_2.pdf)

class.name: EmailClientSettings
class.comment: Opens the default e-mail client with the converted document as attachment

value.name: AddSignature
value.comment: Add the PDFCreator signature to the mail

value.name: Content
value.comment: Body text of the e-mail

value.name: Enabled
value.comment: Enables the EmailClient action

value.name: Html
value.comment: Use html for e-mail body

value.name: Recipients
value.comment: The list of receipients of the e-mail, i.e. info@someone.com; me@mywebsite.org

value.name: RecipientsBcc
value.comment: The list of receipients of the e-mail in the 'BCC' field, i.e. info@someone.com; me@mywebsite.org

value.name: RecipientsCc
value.comment: The list of receipients of the e-mail in the 'CC' field, i.e. info@someone.com; me@mywebsite.org

value.name: Subject
value.comment: Subject line of the e-mail

class.name: EmailSmtpSettings
class.comment: Sends a mail without user interaction through SMTP

value.name: AccountId
value.comment: ID of linked account

value.name: AddSignature
value.comment: Add the PDFCreator signature to the mail

value.name: Content
value.comment: Body text of the mail

value.name: Enabled
value.comment: If true, this action will be executed

value.name: Html
value.comment: Use html for e-mail body

value.name: Recipients
value.comment: The list of receipients of the e-mail, i.e. info@someone.com; me@mywebsite.org

value.name: RecipientsBcc
value.comment: The list of receipients of the e-mail in the 'BCC' field, i.e. info@someone.com; me@mywebsite.org

value.name: RecipientsCc
value.comment: The list of receipients of the e-mail in the 'CC' field, i.e. info@someone.com; me@mywebsite.org

value.name: Subject
value.comment: Subject line of the e-mail

class.name: Ftp
class.comment: Upload the converted documents with FTP

value.name: AccountId
value.comment: ID of the linked account

value.name: Directory
value.comment: Target directory on the server

value.name: Enabled
value.comment: If true, this action will be executed

value.name: EnsureUniqueFilenames
value.comment: If true, files with the same name will not be overwritten on the server. A counter will be appended instead (i.e. document_2.pdf)

class.name: Ghostscript
class.comment: Ghostscript settings

value.name: AdditionalGsParameters
value.comment: These parameters will be provided to Ghostscript in addition to the PDFCreator parameters

class.name: HttpSettings
class.comment: Action to upload files to a HTTP server

value.name: Enabled
value.comment: If true, this action will be executed

class.name: JpegSettings
class.comment: Settings for the JPEG output format

value.name: Color
value.comment: Number of colors.

value.name: Dpi
value.comment: Resolution of the JPEG files

value.name: Quality
value.comment: Quality factor of the resulting JPEG (100 is best, 0 is worst)

class.name: PdfSettings
class.comment: Settings for the PDF output format

class.name: CompressColorAndGray
class.comment: Compression settings for color and greyscale images

value.name: Compression
value.comment: Settings for the compression method.

value.name: Dpi
value.comment: Images will be resampled to this maximum resolution of the images, if resampling is enabled

value.name: Enabled
value.comment: If true, color and grayscale images will be processed according to the algorithm. If false, they will remain uncompressed

value.name: JpegCompressionFactor
value.comment: Define a custom compression factor (requires JpegManual as method)

value.name: Resampling
value.comment: If true, the images will be resampled to a maximum resolution

class.name: CompressMonochrome
class.comment: Compression settings for monochrome images

value.name: Compression
value.comment: Settings for the compression method.

value.name: Dpi
value.comment: Images will be resampled to this maximum resolution of the images, if resampling is enabled

value.name: Enabled
value.comment: If true, monochrome images will be processed according to the algorithm. If false, they will remain uncompressed

value.name: Resampling
value.comment: If true, the images will be resampled to a maximum resolution

class.name: Security
class.comment: PDF Security options

value.name: AllowPrinting
value.comment: Allow to user to print the document

value.name: AllowScreenReader
value.comment: Allow to user to use a screen reader

value.name: AllowToCopyContent
value.comment: Allow to user to copy content from the PDF

value.name: AllowToEditAssembly
value.comment: Allow to user to make changes to the assembly

value.name: AllowToEditComments
value.comment: Allow to user to edit comments

value.name: AllowToEditTheDocument
value.comment: Allow to user to edit the document

value.name: AllowToFillForms
value.comment: Allow to user to fill in forms

value.name: Enabled
value.comment: If true, the PDF file will be password protected

value.name: EncryptionLevel
value.comment: Defines the encryption level.

value.name: OwnerPassword
value.comment: Password that can be used to modify the document

value.name: RequireUserPassword
value.comment: If true, a password is required to open the document.

value.name: RestrictPrintingToLowQuality
value.comment: If true, only printing in low resolution will be supported

value.name: UserPassword
value.comment: Password that must be used to open the document (if set)

class.name: Signature
class.comment: Digitally sign the PDF document

value.name: AllowMultiSigning
value.comment: If true, the PDF file may be signed by additional persons

value.name: CertificateFile
value.comment: Path to the certificate

value.name: DisplaySignatureInDocument
value.comment: If true, the signature will be displayed in the PDF file

value.name: Enabled
value.comment: If true, the signature will be displayed in the PDF document

value.name: LeftX
value.comment: Signature location: Top left corner (X part)

value.name: LeftY
value.comment: Signature location: Top left corner (Y part)

value.name: RightX
value.comment: Signature location: Bottom right corner (X part)

value.name: RightY
value.comment: Signature location: Bottom right corner (Y part)

value.name: SignContact
value.comment: Contact name of the signature

value.name: SignLocation
value.comment: Signature location

value.name: SignReason
value.comment: Reason for the signature

value.name: SignatureCustomPage
value.comment: If the signature page is set to custom, this property defines the page where the signature will be displayed

value.name: SignaturePage
value.comment: Defines the page on which the signature will be displayed.

value.name: SignaturePassword
value.comment: Password for the certificate file

value.name: TimeServerAccountId
value.comment: ID of the linked account for the timeserver

value.name: ColorModel
value.comment: Color model of the PDF (does not apply to images).

value.name: DocumentView
value.comment: Defines which controls will be opened in the reader.

value.name: PageOrientation
value.comment: Define how pages are automatically rotated.

value.name: PageView
value.comment: Defines how the document will be opened in the reader.

value.name: ViewerStartsOnPage
value.comment: Defines the page number the viewer will start on when opening the document

class.name: PngSettings
class.comment: Settings for the PNG output format

value.name: Color
value.comment: Number of colors.

value.name: Dpi
value.comment: Resolution of the PNG files

class.name: Printing
class.comment: Print the document to a physical printer

value.name: Duplex
value.comment: Defines the duplex printing mode.

value.name: Enabled
value.comment: If enabled, the document will be printed to a physical printer

value.name: PrinterName
value.comment: Name of the printer that will be used, if SelectedPrinter is set.

value.name: SelectPrinter
value.comment: Method to select the printer.

class.name: Properties
class.comment: Properties of the profile

value.name: Deletable
value.comment: Can users delete this profile?

value.name: Editable
value.comment: Can users edit this profile?

value.name: Renamable
value.comment: Can users rename this profile?

class.name: Scripting
class.comment: The scripting action allows to run a script after the conversion

value.name: Enabled
value.comment: If true, the given script or application will be executed

value.name: ParameterString
value.comment: Parameters that will be passed to the script in addition to the output files

value.name: ScriptFile
value.comment: Path to the script or application

value.name: WaitForScript
value.comment: Wait until the script excution has ended

class.name: Stamping
class.comment: Place a stamp text on all pages of the document

value.name: Color
value.comment: Color of the text

value.name: Enabled
value.comment: If true, the document all pages will be stamped with a text

value.name: FontAsOutline
value.comment: If true, the text will be rendered as outline. If false, it will be filled.

value.name: FontName
value.comment: Name of the font. (this is only used as a hint, the PostScriptFontName contains the real name)

value.name: FontOutlineWidth
value.comment: Width of the outline

value.name: FontSize
value.comment: Size of the font

value.name: PostScriptFontName
value.comment: PostScript name of the stamp font.

value.name: StampText
value.comment: Text that will be stamped

value.name: Format
value.comment: Text Format (0 outputs XML-escaped Unicode along with information regarding the format of the text | 1 same XML output format, but attempts similar processing to MuPDF, and will output blocks of text | 2 outputs Unicode (UCS2) text (with a Byte Order Mark) which approximates the original text layout | 3 same as 2 encoded in UTF-8)

class.name: TiffSettings
class.comment: Settings for the TIFF output format

value.name: Color
value.comment: Number of colors.

value.name: Dpi
value.comment: Resolution of the TIFF files

class.name: UserTokens
class.comment: Parse ps files for user definied tokens

value.name: Enabled
value.comment: Activate parsing ps files for user tokens (Only available in PDFCreator Business)

value.name: AuthorTemplate
value.comment: Template for the Author field. This may contain tokens.

value.name: FileNameTemplate
value.comment: Template of which the filename will be created. This may contain Tokens.

value.name: Guid
value.comment: GUID of the profile

value.name: KeywordTemplate
value.comment: Template for the Keyword field. This may contain tokens.

value.name: Name
value.comment: Name of the profile

value.name: OpenViewer
value.comment: Open the default viewer after converting the document

value.name: OpenWithPdfArchitect
value.comment: If the output is a PDF, use PDF Architect instead of the default PDF viewer

value.name: OutputFormat
value.comment: Default format for this print job.

value.name: ShowAllNotifications
value.comment: Show a notification after converting the document

value.name: ShowOnlyErrorNotifications
value.comment: Only show notification for error

value.name: ShowProgress
value.comment: If true, a progress window will be shown during conversion

value.name: ShowQuickActions
value.comment: Show quick actions page after converting the document

value.name: SkipPrintDialog
value.comment: Allows to skip the print dialog (where metadata are set) and directly proceed to the save dialog

value.name: SubjectTemplate
value.comment: Template for the Subject field. This may contain tokens.

value.name: TargetDirectory
value.comment: Directory in which the files will be saved (in interactive mode, this is the default location that is presented to the user)

value.name: TitleTemplate
value.comment: Template for the Title field. This may contain tokens.
